iron.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a common hard metal that is used to make steel, is magnetic, and is found in very small quantities in food and blood. It is a chemical element: symbol Fe
iron.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: a driveway with large iron gates
the absorption of iron from food
iron.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a thing used for making clothes smooth, which has a heated flat metal base
iron.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a golf club made of metal rather than wood
iron.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to make clothes smooth using an iron
iron.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: very firm and strong or determined
iron.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: He runs the company with an iron fist.
